meta.name: Only Connect
meta.description: Quiz show in which connections must be made between apparently unconnected things, where patience and lateral thinking are as vital as knowledge.

videos.title: Metrophiles v Whitley Baes
videos.overview: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far – the vital extra ingredients are logic and lateral thinking.Another place in the semi-finals is decided, and the questions are as demanding as ever. For example: Ross, Stoke, Henley... what might come fourth in the sequence?

videos.title: Pitchers v Sorcerers
videos.overview: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far – the vital extra ingredients are logic and lateral thinking.Once again there's a place in the semi-finals on offer, with two teams facing ever more testing questions, such as: 19/2=50, 10/4=100, 30/5=150… what would come fourth in this sequence?

videos.title: Tubers v Bardophiles
videos.overview: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the series where knowledge will only take you so far. Patience and lateral thinking are also vital.Three fans of the London Underground take on a trio of bardophiles in the first of the twelfth series. They'll compete to draw together the connections between things which, at first glance, seem utterly random.So join Victoria Coren Mitchell if you want to know what connects Brownies, Michael Fagan, Freddie Krueger and the Milk Tray Man.
